events.name: BlackBerry Jam Sessions #11 - Sao Paulo, BR
events.about:
hese hackathons are some of the best hackathons in the world. Why do we think they’re the best? Because we’ve listened to what you’ve asked for and we’ve done our best to deliver.

We go to your cities, we bring the experts, feed you with pizza and Red Bull, honor you with prizes and rewards but mainly, we work to create relationships with you. We are there for you, because we want you to be successful. These hackathons are more than a 10 hour long programming session. They will be your chance to learn, practice and create your applications with the support like you’ve never experienced. 

And not only that, you and your application will be part of the most promising competition ever, the Downloads Race. If you participate in any of our #BB10JamSessions, you’ll be able to post your application to run this race and win amazing prizes, like cash, AppWorld promotions, marketing funds and more!!

 More information here: http://www.blackberryjamsessions.com

events.name: Dart Hackathon - Sao Paulo, Brazil
events.about:
— [en-US]

The Dart team invites you to Happy Hour, the first global Dart hackathon, sponsored by Google and produced by the community. Sign up to participate at one of our many locations across the globe.

Be part of the next evolution of web programming. Make an impact by hacking on Dart and sharing your feedback. The team is eager to learn from you. Join us!

Learn more at the Dart Hackathon site.


— [pt-BR]

 

O time do Dart te convida para um Happy Hour, o primeiro hackathon do Dart, patrocinado pelo Google e produzido pela comunidade. Inscreva-se para participar em um dos eventos ao redor do mundo.

 

Seja parte do próximo passo na evolução da programação na web. Cause um impacto hackeando e compartilhando sua opinião. O time está ansioso para saber o que acha. Junte-se a nós!

 

Saiba mais no site Dart Hackathon.

Para mais informações ou em caso de dúvidas sobre a edição brasileira, envie um e-mail para: dart-hack-2012@gdg-sp.org
